  2. Students MUST register and complete the TCS Application Form in the TCS NextStep Portal in ‘IT’ section and the TCS Reference ID should be present in the excel sheet.
  3. All students must ensure that they use their Personal Email ID to register in the TCS NextStep Portal. Email ID CANNOT be change once submitted.
  4. Students should fill up the application form correctly, verify the details before submitting and make sure that their status in the TCS NextStep portal is "Application Received". Students can check this by visiting the "Track My Application" tab in the NextStep portal.
  5. Information retrieved from TCS Application Form will be considered for test process.
  6. We would not be able to batch students if their ‘TCS Application Form’ is incomplete.
  7. Process to complete the TCS application form is outlined below:-

·         Students to visit http://nextstep.tcs.com/campus

·         Click on “Register Now”.

·         Choose the category as “IT”

·         Fill up the details to get a Reference ID.

·         Proceed to complete the Application Form.

Telecommunications Consultants India Ltd. (TCIL) is a Schedule ‘A’ Govt. of India Undertaking incorporated in 1978 under the Administrative control of Department of Telecommunications, Ministry of Communications, Govt. of India.

The Job profile of Executive Trainees, Career Progression/Advancement, Selection Criteria and Pay package is available in the attached PPT.

The selected candidates on joining in TCIL will be required to fill up a bond of Rs. 5,00,000/- (5 Lac)with the Company for a period of three years.

The eligibility criteria/ relevant CGPA (up to 6th Semester) for participating in Campus Interview is 65% or 7.25 CGPA (on 10 point scale) and above for GEN/OBC (NCL)/EWS candidates, and 55% or 6.25 CGPA (on 10 point scale) and above for SC/ST/PWD candidates in B.Tech/B.E. the maximum age limit for appointment in E-0 scale is 30 years, as on 01/08/2024. Relaxation in age limit will be considered as per Govt. of India guidelines.


TCIL is a PSU and placed students can apply. However, if placed, all previous offers stand cancelled and the candidate will have to join the offer from TCIL. The CTC breakup is properly described in the PPT.

data.postData:
Test Date: 

Important Points:

  1. Students only from the year of passing batch of 2024 may apply and the same should reflect in their TCS Application Form.
  2. Students MUST register and complete the TCS Application Form in the TCS NextStep Portal in ‘IT’ section and the TCS Reference ID should be present in the excel sheet.
  3. All students must ensure that they use their Personal Email ID to register in the TCS NextStep Portal. Email ID CANNOT be change once submitted.
  4. Students should fill up the application form correctly, verify the details before submitting and make sure that their status in the TCS NextStep portal is "Application Received". Students can check this by visiting the "Track My Application" tab in the NextStep portal.
  5. Information retrieved from TCS Application Form will be considered for test process.
  6. We would not be able to batch students if their ‘TCS Application Form’ is incomplete.

  8. Process to complete the TCS application form is outlined below:-

·         Students to visit http://nextstep.tcs.com/campus

·         Click on “Register Now”.

·         Choose the category as “IT”

·         Fill up the details to get a Reference ID.

·         Proceed to complete the Application Form.

Subject to test performance clearance, students will get shortlisted for the interview for one of the below offer category however please note that the final offer category will be subject to performance in the overall selection process.

data.postData:
Profile: Advance Application Engineering Analyst

Job Description: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qwXDew4oosLgLo42iWqew-f4-gmsTcOC/view?usp=sharing

Process Flow: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Aim5L7f1bDfaRoUfAnMp0VzITLfqL9wx/view?usp=sharing

Company Guidebook: https://drive.google.com/file/d/100dXv9wXkkjCiB_O7qL23bi3Rnqu5Wkj/view?usp=sharing

IMPORTANT - Registration Link: https://indiacampus.accenture.com/register/accenture/vspallinl1/apply/?event=10903&job=3937

Important Notes for Registration:

  • Register using DTU email id.
  • PAN Card – all students must submit PAN card which has their photo as the identity proof during our registration process.
  • No minor PAN cards are not applicable. If provided, candidate will be rejected from the process.
  • E-PAN Card is accepted, candidates can refer to instructions available in the help link on the registration page.
  • We will not consider PAN card application acknowledgment as a proof of PAN card. Students must mandatorily submit their PAN number and PAN copy which has their photo only
  • The college drop down list in the registration link has branches/location given, candidates need to select the correct branch to avoid any rejection during the documentation stage


Register on both RM and the registration link otherwise candidature stands cancelled.

Eligibility Criteria: 

  • The aggregate of 65%/6.5 CGPA till the 5th semester for UG and till the 7th semester for integrated degree at the time of the recruitment process & onboarding.
  • No active backlogs till 5th semester for UG and till 7th semester for integrated degree during application and no backlogs in all semesters during onboarding.
  • You should have completed your relevant degree (eligible for this job role), in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree. Eg: You must complete your B.Tech in 4 years.
  • Students who have worked with Accenture before (if any) must disclose the details to the Accenture team at the time of application.
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India either by citizenship/ have relevant work permit documents. Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require valid and updated work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience.
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Your highest educational qualification only will be considered.
  • You are willing to work in any Business Unit/Service line within the company.

CTC: 11.89 Lakhs (Base Pay: 9 L + Variable Pay: 1.89 L + Joining Bonus: 1 L)

data.postData:
We are seeking passionate individuals to join our team as Robotics intern, involving in all kind of roles and responsibilities related to related to RnD and curriculum design and all other things like lesson plan and documentation etc. We encourage female candidates to apply, and self-declared teaching experience is preferred. Candidates who have participated in national or international level coding, robotics, and AI competitions will be given special consideration.

Qualifications: Passionate about teaching and inspiring students in the areas of coding, robotics, and AI. Strong knowledge of programming languages such as Python, Java, C++, or similar. Familiarity with robotics platforms and software, such as Arduino, Raspberry Pi, LEGO Mindstorms, or similar. Experience in participating in national or international level coding, robotics, and AI competitions is highly desirable. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and understandable manner. Patient, encouraging, and able to adapt teaching strategies to meet the needs of individual students. Self-motivated, organised, and able to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.

Skills: C++, Python, Arduino, ESP, Raspberry Pi, Google Suite, Canva, Microsoft Teams

Female candidates are encouraged to apply.

To apply, please submit your resume, a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience, and any teaching certifications or awards you have received. Additionally, please include details about your participation in coding, robotics, and AI competitions.

data.postData:
BCN is excited to announce the launch of BrAINWARS competition. 

BrAINWARS is BCN’s case study competition designed for top undergraduate campuses where the participants get a chance to experience the real consulting environment by analyzing and solving live case study problems along with the mentorship of the Bainies. The competition gives an opportunity to the participants to make their learning experience more realistic by challenging themselves to think in a problem-solution direction.

By participating, you can gain practical knowledge, receive mentorship, and network with professionals from Bain while getting a peek into their dynamic industry. Moreover, you will also have the opportunity to win prizes and certificates.

To participate in the competition, please register using the link shared on RM. Registration will get closed by 26/03/2023Sunday at 6:00 PM.

Note: Bachelor students graduating in 2024 are eligible to register for BrAINWARS. 

Once you have registered, you will receive further information about the competition, including rules and guidelines by early next week.

BCN look forward to your participation in BrAINWARS. If you have any questions or require further information, please reach out to the Placements Committees/POCs.

Thank you for your time, and we hope to see you at the competition.

Best regards,

Profile: Advance Application Engineering Intern

Job Description: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VZ1vnnDuMq5KWMVb9Yn1s5pmkKvMgkfH/view?usp=sharing

Process Flow: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1z2qyZmRotu2vH-rkBOqkUiyeVQjnnI2k/view?usp=sharing

Registration Link: https://indiacampus.accenture.com/register/accenture/allinl1/apply/?event=6953&job=3009

Register on both RM and the registration link otherwise candidature stands cancelled.

Important Notes for Registration:

  • Register using DTU email id.
  • PAN Card – all students must submit PAN card which has their photo as the identity proof during our registration process
  • No minor PAN cards are not applicable. If provided, candidate will be rejected from the process
  • E-PAN Cards are accepted, candidates can refer to instructions available in the help link on the registration page
  • We will not consider PAN card application acknowledgment as a proof of PAN card. Students must mandatorily submit their PAN number and PAN copy which has their photo only.

Eligibility Criteria: 

  • B.E, B. Tech - All Branches (Graduating in 2024).
  • Aggregate of 65%/6.5 CGPA in engineering at the time of recruitment process and/or during onboarding.
  • No active backlogs till 3rd Semester during application and no backlogs in all semesters during onboarding.
  • Candidate should not have more than 11 months of experience.
  • Candidate should not have appeared for Accenture Recruitment assessment/interview process in the last three months.
  • Candidate should have completed the relevant degree (eligible for this job role) in the stipulated duration of the degree. Hence, there should be no gaps during the course of your degree. E.g. candidate must complete the 4 year B. Tech course in 4 years.
  • Students who have worked with Accenture before (if any) must disclose the details to the Accenture team at the time of application. 
  • Candidates must be eligible to work in India either by citizenship/ have relevant documents.
  • Please note that Bhutan and Nepal nationals can work in India without a need for obtaining a work visa. All other foreign nationals require work visa or an Overseas Citizenship of India (OCI) or Person of Indian Origin (PIO) card to work in India.
